programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o cpsoct.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; Convert octave-point-decimal value into Hz
ioct = p4 icps = cpsoct(ioct) print icps asig oscil 0.7, icps, 1 outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> ;sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
i 1 0 1 8.75 i 1 + 1 8.77 i 1 + 1 8.79 i 1 + .5 6.30
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
